extendedInfo.description: With only a single button-click, record a voice note, have it converted to text and sent as an email or SMS. Great for safely capturing that important thought when driving, walking, etc. By converting speech to text, it avoids having to listen to audio recordings of notes later and then writing them down.  (Although you can send audio instead, if you wish.)Unlike other apps that send emails semi-automatically, the email is sent completely in the background - no email app to select and no Send button to push. Just start talking and no more interaction with your phone.Other features include:* queueing of messages, recorded as audio only, when no network connection is available* send audio recording instead of text* widget can be setup for each recipient* recording can be set to automatically start when you open the app* optional reading of your message back to you* message confirmation dialog, so you can edit it or cancel it.  If you do nothing, the dialog is automatically dismissed after 5 seconds and the message is sent.* email subject can be set for customized usage with todo and note managers such as Evernote, Toodledo, Wunderlist, and Remember the Milk.* post an event on your calendar by voice* post items to the built-in todo list by voice* a log of all messages is kept, including any attached audio recordings for later listening* Bluetooth support (on some phones)LANGUAGE SUPPORT:Although the app currently has English text for all the menus, etc., the speech recognition supports many different languages. VOICE RECOGNITION:VoiceNote uses Nuance's  or Google's Voice Recognition service as well as Android's Text to Speech service (for prompting and reading your message back to you). These services require a data connection. UPGRADING:VoiceNote can be upgraded to provide eight recipient buttons and remove the ads.  You will find the upgrade option on the app menu.PERMISSIONS:All of those permissions are required to support the features that VoiceNote provides to you. PRIVACY STATEMENT: No personal information is harvested or used in any way other than for its intended purpose (sending your email or SMS).KEYWORDS:safe driving, hands free, speech to text, voice recognition, voice memo, voice note, safe memo, voice to email, voice to SMS, speech recognition, one click, background email, one touch, quick memo, reminder, todo

reviews.title: Solid app, fast hands free messaging
reviews.comment: Developer answered my question within 24 hours. Touch a button with your favorite contact and it instantly converts your voice to text and sends it to them. Not sure how to remove crossed out items from the todo list though... Minor nit.
reviews.author: Tim Jones

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: Upgrades are nice! Well done. Love this ap. One icon on my homescreen launched the process to completion and then returns to homescreen. Prompt, teadback, send, confirm.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Beginnings of an excellent app
reviews.comment: Very simple to use and works very well. Low maturity, needs more setup and interface options, but should be kept simple to use, as it is! I got paid version to support the author and hopefully improvements.
reviews.author: Thomas Papetti

reviews.title: Life Saver!
reviews.comment: Awesome app!! Love it especially when I am driving for memos,evernote notes and reminders. Voice recognition has been spot on. Also received excellent user support when I contacted for help with how to set up.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Best for speaking
reviews.comment: Totally amazing for when you want to take a note and can not write.
reviews.author: Yury German

reviews.title: Excellent app, great support from the developer
reviews.comment: Having originally not been able to work it out - I do tend to rush through things - the developer was kind enough to point out where I was going wrong. I now know how to use an app which allows me to send voice notes to email, calendar and to do list and it works a treat!  I would prefer more than 2 buttons to set preferences but it\'s a great app nonetheless
reviews.author: Rachel Capaldi

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Nice innovative app. A few things need more practice on
reviews.author: Ali Jericho

reviews.title: Works great
reviews.comment: I use this with Wunderlist and it works as it says.
reviews.author: Phillip Wilson

reviews.title: Amazing
reviews.comment: A+
reviews.author: D Stal

reviews.comment: You nailed it I\'ve been looking for this for 4 years, thank you
reviews.author: Patrick Jacobson

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: App is great for my small business to take notes between meetings and Craig is very helpful
reviews.author: Kim Klein

reviews.title: Awesome!
reviews.comment: Awesome!!
reviews.author: Jayke Summers-Valdez

reviews.title: Wow, works beautifully but...
reviews.comment: Minimal setup, amazingly good voice recognition.   BUT I noticed sent texts do not show in my normal txt history.
reviews.author: Chris Lerew

reviews.title: The best
reviews.comment: Thank you for your support and great app. Have loved it for about a year now. Nothing else like it out there Thank you for your support and great app. Have loved it for about a year now. Nothing else like it out there
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: This app is a must have!
reviews.comment: I have used many apps for \"instant note taking\" capability. Reqall was incredible because of the Outlook integration, but they went another direction. Voice Note is accurate, fast, and works great!
reviews.author: Greg Witek

reviews.title: Brilliant!
reviews.comment: The finest app of its type. Period.  Perfect in design and execution. Does specifically what I want which no other app does. Kudos Craig!
reviews.author: David Bromley

reviews.title: Top 3 apps for me
reviews.comment: This is one of the most useful...and easy to use...apps that I have!  I use it for work and home.  Pushing one button and sending myself an email reminder is sheer genius!  Craig, the developer, is also VERY helpful!  I was amazed how quickly he responded to a question!  The functionality and support is great!
reviews.author: Tim Matlick

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Halt
reviews.author: Christopherthomas Cummings

reviews.title: If I could only have one app, voice note would be it
reviews.comment: Has saved my life and the lives of others countless times... By eliminating texting while driving... Thanks, Craig
reviews.author: John Cole

reviews.title: Insanely Great App AND Service!
reviews.comment: I\'ve only been using this app for a few hours now but it is truly amazing. Plus, I had a question for the developer and he got back to me almost immediately! Highly recommended!
reviews.author: Matthew Jensen
